The first 20 min of the movie were intriguing, but then the whole movie went downhill surprisingly fast. By the middle of the movie, you already get bored. By the end of the movie everything stops making any sense and becomes just ridiculous.

Ty extremezone, no doubt will this be in awesome quality.

For anyone bashing the movie, take this in concideration. This movie is intentionally made "stupidly cliche". Drive Angry is all about the action and comedy trough various stupidly overdone scenes. You shouldnt watch this movie thinking that it's godfather or anything. It's a comedy, a chill movie to watch !:D
